com.google.android.exoplayer.upstream

Interface TransferListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BandwidthMeter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultBandwidthMeter

    public interface TransferListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be notified of data transfer events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBytesTransferred(int bytesTransferred)
      Called incrementally during a transfer.
      void onTransferEnd()
      Invoked when a transfer ends.
      void onTransferStart()
      Invoked when a transfer starts.

    • Method Detail

      • onTransferStart

        void onTransferStart()
        Invoked when a transfer starts.

      • onBytesTransferred

        void onBytesTransferred(int bytesTransferred)
        Called incrementally during a transfer.
        Parameters:
        bytesTransferred - The number of bytes transferred since the previous call to this method (or if the first call, since the transfer was started).

      • onTransferEnd

        void onTransferEnd()
        Invoked when a transfer ends.
